title: Game Theory and Strategic Interaction
description: Application of Active Inference to game theory, strategic decision making, and multi-agent interactions.
learning_objectives: Model strategic games using Active Inference
Understand equilibrium concepts from Active Inference perspective

content.overview: Game theory studies strategic interaction between rational agents. Active Inference provides a framework for modeling how agents learn, adapt, and coordinate in game-theoretic settings through belief updating and expected free energy minimization.

normal_form_games.payoff_matrix: A_ij = payoff for player i when players choose actions j
normal_form_games.nash_equilibrium: No player can improve payoff by unilateral deviation
normal_form_games.active_inference: Agents choose actions to minimize expected free energy
normal_form_games.beliefs_about_others: Players form beliefs about opponents' strategies

extensive_form_games.game_tree: Sequential decision making with perfect information
extensive_form_games.backward_induction: Solving games by working backwards from end
extensive_form_games.active_inference_planning: Multi-step planning with expected free energy

learning_in_games.fictitious_play: Players believe opponents play stationary mixed strategies
learning_in_games.active_inference_learning: Learn opponents' strategies through belief updating

cooperative_games.coalition_formation: Players form groups to improve outcomes

examples.name: Prisoner's Dilemma
examples.active_inference: Cooperation when epistemic benefits outweigh defection gains

examples.name: Coordination Games
examples.active_inference: Convergence to focal points through belief alignment

examples.name: Market Entry Game
examples.description: Deciding whether to enter competitive market
examples.setup: Two players decide simultaneously to enter or stay out

evolutionary_game_theory.replicator_dynamics: dx_i/dt = x_i (π_i - π̄) where π_i is payoff for strategy i
evolutionary_game_theory.evolutionarily_stable_strategy: Strategy that cannot be invaded by mutants

mechanism_design.incentive_compatibility: Agents' interests aligned with mechanism goals
mechanism_design.active_inference_design: Design mechanisms that minimize collective free energy
